com.ensoftcorp.open.immutability.analysis

Class ImmutabilityAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ensoftcorp.open.immutability.analysis.ImmutabilityAnalysis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InferenceImmutabilityAnalysis, PointsToImmutabilityAnalysis

    public abstract class ImmutabilityAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    An Atlas native implementation a context-sensitive reference immutability analysis This algorithm is based off the algorithm proposed in: Reference 1: ReIm & ReImInfer: Checking and Inference of Reference Immutability, OOPSLA 2012 Reference 2: Method Purity and ReImInfer: Method Purity Inference for Java, FSE 2012
    Author:
    Ben Holland, Ganesh Santhanam
